name: Space Is Limited (barret232hxc)
description:
Space Is Limited

A puzzle platformer where you have to use skill and cunning to make your way to the exit by collecting all the items. 

  • Every space can only be occupied once ( it will fill up with a block)
    • special cases like bombs can blow up blocks
  • Only one bomb per level
  • Only one screen to focus on
Controls  (Keyboard/Gamepad)
  • MOVE :  Arrows , wasd ,  D-pad ,  Left stick
  • BOMB:  Z key,  X button
  • RESTART:  R key,  B button
  • FULLSCREEN:  F4 key , Y button
  • ACCESS MAIN MENU:  Escape key,  Start button
CREDITS
  • Code/ Art / SFX by @RagTagBarret
  • Music by Trace Callahan
  • Palette ( Ice Cream GB ) by @KerrieLake
  • Pixel Font by @ChevyRay
